title: Textile, 18th or 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: satin, stem, chain and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: On double thickness of off-white cotton, design of groups of people, animals, trees, scattered fowl and insects, all facing toward central crouching camel with howdah on his back.  Wide border of floral rosettes with guard borders of twining garlands.  Embroidery is in shades of green, blue and yellow silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th or 19th century.
18th or 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: satin, stem, chain and couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-24.
